{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NetComm |model=NP740n |revision=A |upc=9317773012705 |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/02/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model=BR-6504n |manuf_rev= |availability=limited distribution |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9565040710 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT1310A |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A2V64S40CTP |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=wireless |default_ssid_regex=^wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:60:64 |oui_eth=00:60:64 }} {{TagLine|NP740n (11n) Wireless Router}} :[http://support.netcommwireless.com/product/wifi/np740n Support page] {{â€¢}} [http://media.netcomm.com.au/public/assets/pdf_file/0011/14699/NP740n_UG.pdf User guide]
"1244-00000520-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Edimax|NetComm}} *This device is an [[Edimax BR-6504n|'''Edimax''' BR-6504n]]. As such, the FCC ID of the OEM product :has been assigned to this device (though Netcomm sold this device primarily :in Australia and there is no FCC ID printed on the label). *Getting this device to work with DD-WRT or other custom firmware could pave :the way for [[#Related Devices|related devices]].
